Artist Spring in Oil Exhibition Gallery Argentina Vargas One Thousand and One Nights I like 1,200.00 $
Carlos PardoTasies was born in San Jose, Costa Rica in 1952, by chance of life since his family lives in Puerto Limon, province of the country where he grew up until he was 6 years old. Since he was a child he was impressed by the colors of the province inhabited mostly by black people. He began to draw from a very young age the boats of the dock and the shacks of the place. The impact of the color of the fruits, the sunrises and the shades used in the houses. Oil
Rodrigo Matus Lazo Managua, Nicaragua About me \@RafaelLopez I was born in the capital of Nicaragua, my passion has been oil painting, being my favorite oil paintings. As a child I was initiated in painting in a natural way, then I was perfecting my technique in professional schools. I have more than 10 years of experience in painting. Plastic artist Nicaragua 09:00AM Oil Painting
